name: Candy Cane (Peppermint and Vanilla) Soap (LIMITED)
description:
Tis the season to be Jolly...falalalala...lalalala 

Indulge your sweet tooth, in this gorgeous scented 'Candy Cane' inspired soap. Not to eat of course, but to bath with! A seriously moisturising soap with splash of natural pink/white, this is a perfect gift for your sweet heart.

Ingredients: 
Aqua, organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic castor oil, organic avocado oil, madder root, organic peppermint oil, organic vanilla extract and organic vertiver oil

95% of the ingredients used in making the soaps are certified organic by Australian standards

Caution 
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics 
100% Vegan friendly & Cruelty free 
Made with kindness using natural and organic ingredients 
Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: Mumma Belly Bars - 100% organic
description:
For mamas, this is the best time of your life. You are growing a human being inside of you! Now that is just utterly amazing...you go girl!

We have the perfect delight for our beautiful mammas. The mumma belly bars will keep your skin moisturised, supple and helps reduce new stretch marks forming.

Great gift for anyone who loves a relaxing massage.

Use twice a day after a shower

Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Shea Butter, Candelilla Wax, Organic Mandarin Oil, Organic Geranium Oil. 

It is 100% organic, vegan friendly and 100% preservative free!!

name: Close Shave Soap (Cedarwood and Lime)
description:
Trying to keep those underarms tamed? Or does your girlfriend shoot you the ‘killer’ stare when you are resembling more wolf than man? ‘Close Shave’ soap provides the perfect amount of ‘slip’ for all your shaving woes, at the same time moisturising the skin and reducing post-shave irritation. Infused with Lime essential oil brings a smile to a SELFies dial.

Ingredients: 
Aqua, Organic Olive Oil, Organic Castor Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Bentonite Clay, Organic Palm Oil, Oxide (to give brown colour), Organic Lime and Cedarwood Oil

All our soaps are made with at least 95% organic ingredients

*These soaps are on sale due to the slightly imperfect shape of the SELF Logo. It still works a treat!

Caution
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics 
100% Vegan friendly & Cruelty free
Made with kindness using natural and organic ingredients
Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: Lavender Fields (French Lavendar) Soap
description:
Silky soft skin, as fair as Snow White? Don’t dismay damsel, ‘Lavender Fields’ soap has skin soothing properties such as Australia Kaolin White clay to calm irritated skin. Enjoy a warm bath and indulge your senses with scents of French Lavender that will transport you straight to the fields in Provence! For the SELFies who love a bit of pampering pleasure.

Ingredients:
Aqua, Organic Shea Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, White Clay, Organic French Lavender Oil

All our soaps are made with at least 95% organic ingredients

Caution
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics 
100% Vegan friendly & Cruelty free
Made with kindness using natural and organic ingredients
Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: No Frills (no fragrance) Soap
description:
‘No Frills’ contains no add essential oils, it is made purely from organic butters and oils. Enjoy the natural scents of coconut and cocoa nut that pampers your senses. Enriched with olive oil that will help keep your skin soft and smooth. Especially made for no fuss SELFies who like their skincare simple and superb. 

Ingredients:
Aqua, Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Olive Oil 

All our soaps are made with at least 95% organic ingredients

Caution 
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics 
100% Vegan friendly & Cruelty free

Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: AM to PM (Grapefruit & Mandarin) Soap
description:
Whack! It is time to rise and shine bedhead, ‘AM to PM’ soap will take you from snoozeland into rays of sunshine. Made with organic oils and butters and scented with grapefruit oil this soap will be your shining beacon of the day! Use it in the morning or when you return from a hard day’s work. SELFies rejoice for the day is good!

Ingredients:
Aqua, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Organic Olive Oil, Madder Root Powder, Organic Grapefruit Oil and Organic Mandarin Oil

Caution
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics

Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: Superhero (Charcoal) Soap
description:
The dark defender ‘Superhero’ soap is here to save the day! It is packed with ingredients to help clear up spots and blemishes on the skin. Activated charcoal gives this soap its black hue and helps to deodorize the skin and soak up impurities to leave the surface feeling squeaky clean. Safe for SELFies to use on the face. Don’t be scared of the dark…embrace it!

Ingredients:
Aqua, Organic Olive Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Organic Castor Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, Activated Charcoal, Organic Tea Tree Oil and Organic Peppermint Oil

95% of the ingredients used in making the soaps are certified organic by Australian standards

Caution
Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

For best results, keep bar well drained between uses.

Hand Made in Australia by SELF Organics 
100% Vegan friendly & Cruelty free
Made with kindness using natural and organic ingredients
Packaged with Eco-friendly materials, 100% biodegradable

name: Gingerbread Soap
description:
Freshly baked smells of cinnamon, ginger, clove...this is one sweet smelling soap that smells good enough to eat. Indulge in everyone's favourite childhood biscuit without having any impact on your waistline at all!

Ingredients:
Aqua, organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sunflower oil, organic shea butter, organic ginger oil, organic clove oil, organic cinnamon oil, ground cinnamon, ground ginger and ground cloves, brown oxide.

95% of the ingredients used in making the soaps are certified organic by Australian standards

Caution
